mapper.select: SELECT h.id, salary, browse_count, r.work_year, r.education, j.name as jobName, f.name AS foodType, h.hunt_date, h.work_area, userInfo.userName, userInfo.sex FROM hunt h INNER JOIN resume r ON h.resume_id = r.id INNER JOIN job j ON h.job_id = j.id INNER JOIN food_type f ON h.food_type_id = f.id INNER JOIN sys_user_info userInfo on r.user_id = userInfo.sys_user_id
